Hero.subtitle: Personal Trainer & Nutritionist
Hero.description: I transform lives through personalized training and mindful nutrition. Your best version starts today.

About.imageAlt: Sandra Lord√©n √Ålvarez, personal trainer and nutritionist in Madrid
About.paragraph1: I've always been a very active girl who loved sports. When I finished school, I decided to focus my career on deepening my understanding of exercise science and nutrition, which I fell deeply in love with and was able to turn my passion into my profession.
About.paragraph2End: , with the goal of helping people become their best selves. I want anyone who works with me to see me not just as their trainer, but as a friend who wants to support and guide them through the process.

Services.description: Different options to adapt to your needs, schedule, and goals. Always with a professional and personalized approach.
Services.presencialDesc1: If you enjoy personal interaction and need someone to correct your form, motivate you, and be close by, this is the training option for you.
Services.presencialDesc2: At home or outdoors, alone or with a partner. You don't need any equipment ‚Äî I bring a wide range of portable professional equipment that rivals any gym. This is without a doubt the most complete option for reaching peak performance and the best choice for those starting their fitness journey.
Services.onlineDesc: Online coaching is the best alternative for having a professional create specific training and nutrition programs tailored to your needs, remotely.
Services.step1Desc: Fill out a questionnaire about your fitness level, diet, goals, and injuries. With your answers, I'll create your custom plan.
Services.step2Desc: We communicate via email, WhatsApp, or video call to resolve doubts and keep you motivated. Daily contact if you need it.
Services.step3Desc: Every 4 weeks we renew the plan based on your progress, so you keep advancing without plateaus. No commitment required.
Services.nutricionDesc: No matter how much you train, without proper nutrition you won't achieve the results you want. Personalized nutrition plan adapted to your tastes, schedule, and goals, with food photos.
Services.entrenamientoDesc: Individualized plan for gym or home, with detailed information, execution photos, and notes. If you need videos of any exercise, just ask.
Services.packDesc: Training + nutrition together. The perfect combination to maximize your results with a fully personalized comprehensive plan.
Services.packFeature5: PDF format with photos and notes
Services.extraInfo: All plans are in PDF format and include detailed information, exercise and food photographs.
Services.extraInfoBold: You decide if you want to continue.

Testimonials.t1Text: Sandra not only helped me reach my physical goals, but she changed my relationship with food and exercise. She's an incredible professional and, above all, someone who truly supports you.
Testimonials.t2Text: I started with no idea how to train and Sandra guided me step by step. Her plans are super clear, with photos and explanations. And the best part is she's always there for any question.
Testimonials.t3Text: I spent years at the gym not really knowing what to do. Since training with Sandra, my results have skyrocketed. She taught me to train smart and eat well without starving.
Testimonials.t4Text: The nutrition plan Sandra made for me was a turning point. Adapted to my tastes, my schedule, and with options to keep it from getting boring. Real and sustainable results.
Testimonials.t5Text: Sandra is a motivation machine. Sessions fly by and her technique corrections are incredible. In three months I noticed a huge change both physically and in energy.
Testimonials.t6Text: I thought online training wouldn't be the same, but Sandra makes every week intense and personalized. Always attentive on WhatsApp and the monthly check-ins make all the difference.

Press.description: I regularly collaborate with Spain's leading fitness and wellness magazines and media outlets as an expert in training and sports nutrition.

FAQ.a1: Yes, I offer online training and nutrition coaching with ongoing support via WhatsApp, email, or video call. Plans are delivered in PDF format with photos, notes, and all the info you need.
FAQ.a2: I offer in-person personal training (at home or outdoors) and online coaching for nutrition, training (gym or home), and complete pack. All plans are 100% personalized and tailored to you.
FAQ.a3: Yes, I hold a degree in Exercise Science and Physical Activity (CAFYD) with a double Master's in Sports Nutrition and High Performance. I've been helping more than 1000 people reach their goals for 10 years.
FAQ.a4: Fill out the transformation questionnaire here on the website. I'll analyze your data, send you a personalized analysis by email, and contact you on WhatsApp to define your custom plan.
FAQ.q5: Do I need prior experience to train with you?
FAQ.a5: Not at all. I work with all levels, from beginners to advanced. I adapt each plan to your level, goals, and availability. The important thing is to take the first step.
FAQ.q6: How long until I see results?
FAQ.a6: It depends on your goals and starting point, but most of my clients notice changes within the first 3-4 weeks. Solid, sustainable results are seen from 3 months onwards with consistency.

Contact.successDesc: Thanks for writing. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Formulario.pageSubtitle: I need to get to know you well to prepare a plan tailored just for you. The more details you give me, the better I can help.
Formulario.successDesc1: I have all your info. I'm getting to work on your plan.
Formulario.successDesc2WhatsApp: I'll message you on WhatsApp as soon as it's ready and we'll get started.
Formulario.labelWeight: How much do you weigh now? (kg)
Formulario.labelEnfermedades: Have you had any illnesses since childhood? Which ones?
Formulario.labelLesiones: Do you have any injuries? Which ones?
Formulario.placeholderLesiones: E.g.: Sprained ankle, tendinitis... or None
Formulario.labelCirugias: Have you had any surgeries? What for?
Formulario.labelDiabetes: Do you have Diabetes I or II?
Formulario.labelHipertension: Do you have High Blood Pressure?
Formulario.labelCorazon: Do you have any heart conditions? Which ones?
Formulario.placeholderCorazon: E.g.: Arrhythmia, heart murmur... or No
Formulario.labelDigestivo: Do you have constipation, irritable bowel, or digestive pain?
Formulario.labelMedicamentos: Do you take any medications or medical supplements? Which ones?
Formulario.placeholderFumaOBebe: E.g.: I don't smoke, I drink socially on weekends
Formulario.labelDescanso: Do you rest well? How many hours of sleep on average?
Formulario.labelComidas: How many meals do you have per day and at what times?
Formulario.labelApetito: How would you describe your appetite?
Formulario.labelMomentoApetito: At what time of day are you hungriest?
Formulario.foodNeutral: Those left unmarked will be considered neutral.
Formulario.labelDiaTipo: Describe a typical day: what do you eat from when you wake up until bedtime?
Formulario.placeholderDiaTipo: E.g.: I wake up at 7, have coffee with toast. At 10 a yogurt. At 14 rice with chicken...
Formulario.labelAlergias: Are you allergic to any food or does anything not agree with you? What?
Formulario.placeholderAlergias: E.g.: Lactose intolerant, nut allergy... or None
Formulario.labelSuplementos: Do you take any supplements? Which ones? (if possible, tell me the brand and send me a photo via WhatsApp)
Formulario.placeholderSuplementos: E.g.: Gold Standard whey protein, creatine... or I don't take any
Formulario.labelSuplementosInteres: If you don't take supplements, would you like to start with any to meet your goals?
Formulario.placeholderSuplementosInteres: E.g.: Yes, I'd like to know what I could take / Not interested
Formulario.dietaTitle: Have you done any diets before?
Formulario.dietaNote: Fill this out only if you've done a diet before. It helps me know what has and hasn't worked for you.
Formulario.placeholderDietaBase: E.g.: Keto diet, calorie deficit, intermittent fasting...
Formulario.labelDietaTiempo: How long ago did you do it?
Formulario.placeholderDietaResultado: E.g.: Lost 5kg but gained it back, felt good but wasn't sustainable...
Formulario.labelDiasActual: How many days do you currently train per week? Tell me the specific days if you can
Formulario.placeholderDiasActual: E.g.: 3 days ‚Äî Monday, Wednesday, and Friday / I don't currently train
Formulario.labelDiasCompromiso: How many days do you commit to training with this plan? Tell me the specific days if you can
Formulario.placeholderDiasCompromiso: E.g.: 4 days ‚Äî Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday
Formulario.labelHoraEntreno: What time will you be training?
Formulario.labelDuracionSesion: How long does each session usually last?
Formulario.labelCasaGimnasio: Do you want the plan for home or the gym?
Formulario.labelMaterialCasa: If you train at home, what equipment do you have?
Formulario.placeholderMaterialCasa: E.g.: Dumbbells, resistance bands, mat, pull-up bar... or Nothing
Formulario.labelRendimiento: In terms of physical performance, what would you like to improve?
Formulario.placeholderRendimiento: Also tell me if you notice pain, heaviness, lack of energy, cramps... and when it happens.
Formulario.labelEstetica: Aesthetically, what would you like to change?
Formulario.placeholderEstetica: E.g.: Tone legs and glutes, lose belly fat, define arms...
Formulario.sectionExtra: Anything else you'd like to tell me?
Formulario.labelExtra: Here's a free space for whatever you want (optional)
Formulario.placeholderExtra: Questions, motivation, personal situation... whatever you think might help me know you better.
Formulario.privacyCheck: I have read and accept the
Formulario.submitNote: As soon as I receive it, I'll message you on WhatsApp and we'll get started
Formulario.errorDefault: There was an error. Please try again.
